column1: This is a list of cities and towns with over 10
column2: 000 inhabitants (or lower if the municipality has over 20
column3: 000 inhabitants) in Bosnia and Herzegovina. For the full list of populated places

column3: Bosnia and Herzegovina also has officially designated cities. Official cities have their own mayor and city council
column4: which is a big difference to the municipalities of Bosnia and Herzegovina
column5: which have a municipal council and mayor. Powers of city councils of official cities are between the government of municipalities and governments cantons in the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina or a government entity in the Republika Srpska. There are twenty four official cities in Bosnia and Herzegovina (as of 2019):

column1: The list includes only the 56 cities / towns and municipalities whose administrative area has a population greater than 20
column6: since it is a city only in administrative sense and doesn't have a city proper.
